ios.title: Espresso Martini
ios.description: A Vapor-powered, Swift local server. Test your apps with realistic API responses and edge cases.

ios.title: Spritz
ios.description: An Italian tax number (AKA Codice Fiscale) creator and validator SDK. Provides algorithm-based tax code generation and validation.

ios.title: Mocka
ios.description: A Mock Server Made for Developers by Developers. Built with Swift and SwiftUI for macOS, featuring Combine and Vapor integration.

ios.title: Toosie Slide
ios.description: A simple Swift library to generate a carousel-like effect. Provides custom collection view flow layout for iOS applications.

web.title: SODA CLUBBING
web.description: A bold loud website, for Milan's number one explicit party.

web.title: fattiicazzituoi.it
web.description: A SFW generator of ways to say `fatti i cazzi tuoi`.

web.title: GiuliaGiacone.com
web.description: I designed and built a portfolio website for a Milan based stylist. The goal was to build a fun, girly, minimal website.

web.title: BiancaBeltramello.com
